titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Defense to modify the Certificate of Release or Discharge from Active Duty (DD Form 214) to include a specific block explicitly identified as the location in which a member of the Armed Forces may provide one or more email addresses by which the member may be contacted.
DD-214 Modernization Act
DD–214 Modernization Act
DD-214 Modernization Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
